sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"自愿的"之意。
means: voluntary ： 使用广泛，侧重不受约束，行动不为其他影响所左右。
willing ： 着重自愿、令人愉快或急切地去行动。

sentence.Network_en: An e-mail is already circulating amongst news staff calling for voluntary redundancies.
sentence.Network_cn: 在新闻部员工中已经在转发一封电子邮件,呼吁大家自愿裁汰.

sentence.Network_en: Because the work was voluntary it was flexible, time-wise.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项工作是自愿的，所以时间上很灵活。

sentence.Network_en: He is still involved in voluntary work promoting local enterprise.
sentence.Network_cn: 他仍在从事促进当地创业的志愿者工作。

第一类是自愿（voluntary）：表示当事人在知情和同意之下，或应当事人的主动要求。换句话说，自愿性的安乐死其实即是帮助人去 …
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... rev（ 旋转，变速）； voluntary（ 志愿的，自动的）； evolve（ 演化，逐渐发展）…
另一方面，神经系统也具有随意的(voluntary)功能。你极想要某件事发生，从脑部透过神经组织维将讯息达至肌肉，令肌肉收缩或松弛，以移动你身体的某一部.

list.abs: 各种学校英文名称 ... 成人学校 adult school 民办学校 voluntary school 补习学校 continuation school.
百科名片由人的主观意识控制和调节、具有一定目的和指向的运动。简介随意运动(voluntary movement) 又称“自主运动”,是指意识支配下受大脑皮层运动区直接控制的.
脊椎动物的横纹肌多附着在骨骼上，也称骨骼肌(skeletalmuscle)， 由于受意志控制，又称随意肌(voluntary muscle)，其平滑肌主要分布在内脏，不受意志控制，又称不随意肌(involu-ntary muscle)。脊.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French volontaire or Latin voluntarius, from voluntas 'will'

entry.tran: 自愿的;志愿的;主动的;自发的
entry.def: Voluntary actions or activities are done because someone chooses to do them and not because they have been forced to do them.

example.ex: Attention is drawn to a special voluntary course in Commercial French...
example.tran: 一门特别的商务法语选修课引起了大家的关注。

example.ex: The scheme, due to begin next month, will be voluntary.
example.tran: 定于下个月开始实施的方案是自愿性质的。

entry.def: Voluntary work is done by people who are not paid for it, but who do it because they want to do it.

example.ex: In her spare time she does voluntary work...
He'd  been working at the local hostel for the handicapped on a voluntary basis.
example.tran: 他曾在当地的残疾人救助站当过义工。

entry.def: A voluntary worker is someone who does work without being paid for it, because they want to do it.

example.ex: Apna Arts has achieved more with voluntary workers in three years than most organisations with paid workers have achieved in ten...
example.tran: “我们”艺术中心依靠志愿者在3年内取得的成就超过了大多数雇用受薪员工的机构10年中取得的成绩。

example.ex: We depend solely upon our voluntary helpers.
example.tran: 我们完全依靠我们的志愿者。

entry.tran: （机构或组织）志愿的，义务性的
entry.def: A voluntary organization is controlled and organized by the people who have chosen to work for it, often without being paid, rather than receiving help or money from the government.

example.ex: Some local authorities and voluntary organizations also run workshops for disabled people...
example.tran: 一些当地机构和志愿组织也为残疾人开设了一些工场。

example.ex: It has been largely through the voluntary sector that the needs of victims have been met.
example.tran: 受害者的需要主要是通过志愿组织予以满足的。

means.word_mean: 1. (military) a person who freely enlists for service
2. composition (often improvised) for a solo instrument (especially solo organ) and not a regular part of a service or performance
1. of your own free will or design; not forced or compelled;

stems_affixes.word_buile: volunt意志,意愿+ary……的→adj.自愿的,志愿的
volunt=vol意志,意愿+eer人→意愿的人→志愿者

sentences.en: He made a voluntary statement to the police.
sentences.cn: 他自动向警方供出一切。

sentences.en: That he bumped me is voluntary.
At election time the party needs a lot of voluntary helpers.
sentences.cn: 大选时, 该党需要许多义务帮忙的人。

jushi.english: He made a voluntary statement to the police.
jushi.chinese: 他自动向警方提出口供。

jushi.english: At election time the party needs a lot of voluntary helpers.
jushi.chinese: 大选时,该党需要许多义工帮忙。
